allVersions.changelog: Now working on linux. Minor bug fixes for windows/linux.
New Interface and too many new features to list here. Please Update.
Fixed player chart, onesync detection, and minor stuff
Hotfix for the login problems. Node version checker
New Settings Page and setup script. Changed how server profiles work. Please read new instructions before updating.
Now saving the server log and showing it when you open the Live Console. Added a button to download the log below the console.
Scheduled restarts announcements 15 minutes before. Discord announcements on server start/stop/restart.
